name: isfahan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the central part of Iran: Golshiri was born into a working-class family in the historical and industrial city of Isfahan. The aircraft lost contact with the Isfahan airport control tower minutes before landing.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Isfahan the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Isfahan.The order was given for uranium conversion to resume at Isfahan after a two-year gap.These fresco paintings are reconstructions of the seventeenth-century originals in Isfahan.
